description: Position and dimensions of a panel in the grid

h.description: Panel height. The height is the number of rows from the top edge of the panel.

w.description: Panel width. The width is the number of columns from the left edge of the panel.

x.description: Panel x. The x coordinate is the number of columns from the left edge of the grid

y.description: Panel y. The y coordinate is the number of rows from the top edge of the grid

static.description: Whether the panel is fixed within the grid. If true, the panel will not be affected by other panels' interactions

title: GridPos
